page.title: 07A Saturday In Garston
page.content: I got up and watched{television}at 7.13 a.m. at my Nan's house. I got fed up: I wished there were more cartoons on the B.B.C. My Nan came down and made{breakfast of crumpets}and toast. I read a book called 'More Crazy' then I got dressed. Later I went home with my Dad and drew Robin Hood escaping from Nottingham Castle. At 1.35 p.m. I had{dinner of meatballs}and chips. After dinner I finished drawing. Then my Dad, sister and I walked to the village to buy something to fix my Dad's bike, and a battery for his watch. At 4.00 p.m. I went to the field on my bike. When I returned, my Mum was back from work. I drew a Space Base. At 5.24 p.m. we had tea and watched television. I went out to play then returned to my{Nan's to sleep}at 8.45 p.m. I went to bed at 10.17 p.m. BRIAN O'CARROLL (9)
